valueProps.text: Helps businesses stay compliant with local tax laws
Seamlessly integrates e-invoicing with corporate tax filing
Designed to simplify complex tax compliance tasks

pains: Reduce reliance on traditional word and Excel documents
Manage more clients without increasing staff overhead
proof: Automated workflows save up to 40% of time
Enables firms to manage 30-40% more clients

facts.text: Tax Star is an AI-powered corporate tax software.
facts.evidence: Tax Star is an AI-powered corporate tax software designed specifically for businesses in the UAE.
It provides a comprehensive compliance toolkit that includes corporate tax calculations, e-invoicing, and Zakat calculations for businesses in KSA.
Automates tax return processes, ensuring timely and accurate submissions.

facts.text: Simplifies the production of IFRS financial statements.
facts.evidence: Simplifies the production of financial statements, reducing reliance on traditional word and Excel documents.

facts.text: Notifies users of upcoming document expirations.
facts.evidence: Notifies users of upcoming document expirations to avoid penalties.

facts.text: Automated workflows save up to 40% of time.
facts.evidence: Saves up to 40% of time by automating corporate tax calculations and workflows.
Automated reminders and tracking help ensure compliance and timely filings.

facts.text: Enables firms to manage 30-40% more clients.
facts.evidence: Enables firms to manage 30-40% more clients without increasing staff overhead.

facts.text: Helps businesses stay compliant with local tax laws.
facts.evidence: Helps businesses stay compliant with local tax laws, reducing the risk of penalties.

facts.text: Integrates e-invoicing with corporate tax filing.
facts.evidence: Seamlessly integrates e-invoicing with corporate tax filing to ensure compliance.
Streamlines corporate tax processes, allowing firms to focus on higher-value advisory tasks.

facts.text: Designed to simplify complex tax compliance tasks.
facts.evidence: Designed to simplify complex tax compliance tasks, making it accessible for users with varying levels of expertise.

facts.text: Offers a free trial for users.
facts.evidence: It offers a free trial for users to explore the software's features.

facts.text: Ensures invoices are compliant with the Federal Tax Authority.
facts.evidence: Ensures invoices are compliant with the Federal Tax Authority (FTA).

facts.text: Facilitates Zakat calculations aligned with compliance reporting.
facts.evidence: Facilitates Zakat calculations aligned with compliance reporting.

facts.text: Provides various resources including video tutorials and webinars.
facts.evidence: Tax Star provides various resources, including video tutorials, podcasts, webinars, and blogs.
